member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_ORIENTATION_ANGLE
member.summary: The DWRITE_GLYPH_ORIENTATION_ANGLE enumeration contains values that specify how the glyph is oriented to the x-axis.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_ORIENTATION_ANGLE.DWRITE_GLYPH_ORIENTATION_ANGLE_90_DEGREES
member.summary: Glyph orientation is rotated 90 degrees clockwise.

member.name: DWRITE_GLYPH_ORIENTATION_ANGLE.DWRITE_GLYPH_ORIENTATION_ANGLE_270_DEGREES
member.summary: Glyph orientation is rotated 270 degrees clockwise.
